山なり: (やまなり) - curved; forming the shape of an arch
山のよう: (やまのよう) - plentiful; lot of; much
山の幸: (やまのさち) - food of the mountains (wild game, mountain vegetables, mushrooms, etc.); fruits of the land
山の手: (やまのて) - hilly section of a city (usu. residential)/Yamanote (hilly residential section of western Tokyo, incl. Yotsuya, Aoyama, Koishikawa, Hongo, Ichigaya, Akasaka, Azabu and surrounds); place near the mountains
山の手言葉: (やまのてことば) - the refined speech of the uptown residents of Tokyo
山の様: (やまのよう) - plentiful; lot of; much
山の神: (ヤマノカミ) - (やまのかみ only) mountain god; (やまのかみ only)  one's wife (sometimes esp. a nagging wife); roughskin sculpin (Trachidermus fasciatus)
山びこ: (やまびこ) - echo (esp. one reverberating in the mountains); mountain god/mountain guardian deity
山ほど: (やまほど) - a heap; great amount of
山もがし: (ヤマモガシ) - Helicia cochinchinensis (species of flowering plant)
山ろく: (さんろく) - foot of a mountain; base of a mountain
山をなす: (やまをなす) - to pile up; to form into a (huge) pile
山を作す: (やまをなす) - to pile up; to form into a (huge) pile
山を張る: (やまをはる) - to speculate; to make an educated guess; to gamble (e.g. on getting the right questions)
山を成す: (やまをなす) - to pile up; to form into a (huge) pile
山を掛ける: (やまをかける) - to speculate; to make an educated guess; to gamble (e.g. on getting the right questions)
山を越す: (やまをこす) - to surmount a difficulty; to go across a mountain
山ガール: (やまガール) - outdoor clothing fashion style for young women; young woman who dresses in outdoor clothing; young woman who enjoys mountain climbing
山ビーバー: (ヤマビーバー) - mountain beaver (Aplodontia rufa)
山上の垂訓: (さんじょうのすいくん) - the Sermon on the Mount
山下: (やまもと) - foot of a mountain/base of a mountain; (esp. 山元) mine/colliery; (esp. 山元) owner of a mountain/operator of a mine
山下公園: (やましたこうえん) - park in Yokohama
山下駄: (やまげた) - rough geta (e.g. made of Japanese cedar)
山並み: (やまなみ) - range of mountains; mountain range; mountain belt
山中: (やまなか) - in the mountains; among the mountains
山主: (やまぬし) - owner of a mountain; proprietor of a mine
山人: (さんじん) - mountain folk/hermit; (やまびと only)  mountain wizard; (さんじん only) word used as part of a pseudonym by artists, writers, etc.
山伏: (やまぶし) - mountain priest; itinerant Buddhist monk
山伏茸: (ヤマブシタケ) - bearded tooth fungus (Hericium erinaceum); lion's mane mushroom
山伝い: (やまづたい) - (passing along) from mountain to mountain
山偏: (やまへん) - kanji "mountain" radical at left
山元: (やまもと) - foot of a mountain/base of a mountain; (esp. 山元) mine/colliery; (esp. 山元) owner of a mountain/operator of a mine
山元派: (さんげんは) - Yamamoto sect (of Shin Buddhism); Sangen sect
山兎: (やまうさぎ) - mountain rabbit; mountain hare
山内: (さんない) - in the mountains; within the grounds of a temple
山冠: (やまかんむり) - kanji "mountain" radical at top
山出し: (やまだし) - bumpkin; person from the country; unrefined person recently arrived from the countryside
山卸: (やまおろし) - mashing of steamed rice, mold and water with wooden poles in traditional sake making
山卸し: (やまおろし) - mashing of steamed rice, mold and water with wooden poles in traditional sake making
山卸廃止酛: (やまおろしはいしもと) - sake brewing using natural yeast and no mashing
山原: (やんばる) - mountain areas of Kunigami County in Northern Okinawa
山原手長黄金虫: (ヤンバルテナガコガネ) - Yanbaru long-armed scarab beetle (Cheirotonus jambar)
山原水鶏: (ヤンバルクイナ) - Okinawa rail (Gallirallus okinawae)
山口県: (やまぐちけん) - Yamaguchi prefecture (Chuugoku area)
山号: (さんごう) - honorific mountain name prefixed to a temple's name
山合い: (やまあい) - valley; ravine; glen; gorge
山名: (さんめい) - name of a mountain
山吹: (やまぶき) - kerria (Kerria japonica)/Japanese yellow rose; bright golden yellow; gold coin
山吹色: (やまぶきいろ) - bright golden yellow
山吹草: (ヤマブキソウ) - Chelidonium japonicum (species of poppy)
山地帯: (さんちたい) - montane zone; mountain zone
山外: (さんがい) - Off-Mountain School (of Song-period Tiantai Buddhism)
山奇量: (サンキライ) - Smilax glabra (species of sarsaparilla); Smilax china (species of sarsaparilla)
山奥: (やまおく) - deep in the mountains; mountain recesses
山女: (ヤマメ) - landlocked masu salmon (Oncorhynchus masou masou)
山女魚: (ヤマメ) - landlocked masu salmon (Oncorhynchus masou masou)
山守: (やまもり) - guardian of a mountain
山家: (さんか) - mountain villa; house in the mountains; mountain retreat
山容: (さんよう) - in the shape or form of a mountain
山容水態: (さんようすいたい) - (yoji) scenic beauty of mountains and streams; fresh and clear beauty of nature's splendor
山山: (やまやま) - (many) mountains; (often as 〜のはやまやまである, etc.) very much (esp. wanting to do something one cannot)/greatly/really
山岨: (やまそわ) - mountain cliff; mountain precipice
山岳会: (さんがくかい) - mountaineering club; climbing club
山岳信仰: (さんがくしんこう) - mountain worship; religion that worships mountains as sacred
山岳部: (さんがくぶ) - mountaineering club; mountain area
山岳部時間: (さんがくぶじかん) - Mountain Time (US time zone)
山岳重畳: (さんがくちょうじょう) - (yoji) mountains rising one above another
山崎派: (やまさきは) - Yamasaki Faction (of the LDP)
山嵐: (やまあらし) - mountain storm; yamaarashi/judo throwing technique
